RaCE.NMA

The RaCE.NMA R package implements the the Rank-Clustering Estimation model for Network Meta-Analysis proposed by Pearce and Zhou (2025+).

Where can I learn more?

To learn more about the rank-clustering methodology implemented in this package, check out our arXiv preprint!

For information on how to download the RaCE.NMA package from Github, see the Overview tab. After, check out the Reference tab for details on the package’s use.

Acknowledgements and Funding

This project is partially supported by NIH Grant R21LM014534. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.
